data.title: Yale MPB040 Electric Pallet Jacks
data.meta-title: Used Yale MPB040 Electric Pallet Jacks
data.meta-description: Used Yale MPB040 Electric Pallet Jacks

attribute.name: Weight
attribute.value: 925 lbs. w/ Battery, 625 lbs. w/o Battery

ul.li: Tapered forks provide industry leading pallet entry and exit!
Lifts loads up to 4,000 lbs. as high as 6" with ease!
Standard 27" x 48" forks offer easy entry into any standard pallet

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 1.25em; padding: 0px; direction: ltr; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: #313131; background-color: #ffffff;
p.span: Used Yale Electric Pallet Jack for sale at American Surplus is in stock. All used electric pallet jacks from ASI are cleaned, tested, painted and have a 30 day ASI guarantee. We make sure all functions are operational when you receive your truck! This electric pallet jack has a 4,000 lb. capacity. The forks on this unit are 27" x 48", and it is the ride on style of pallet jacks. It comes with a 24V battery. Call today to learn more about our used Yale electric pallet jacks and get a quote today.

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 1.25em; padding: 0px; direction: ltr; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: #313131; background-color: #ffffff;

span.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used electric pallet jacks 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
